fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: Do not include official party splits (when one party divides into two or more parties) or dissolutions (when a party formally dissolves).
fxInfo_question: Roughly what percentage (%) of the members of the national legislature changes or abandons their party in between elections?
